name: IsNoetherianRing.wfDvdMonoid
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommSemiring R
inst✝ : IsDomain R
h : IsNoetherianRing R

decl:
instance (priority := 100) IsNoetherianRing.wfDvdMonoid [h : IsNoetherianRing R] :
